item.description:
hey, just an idea as I'm all DJ'd out.  Slakas is a great rock 'n roll band, and even though the Haluwa Chinese rest. in Nashua, off Broad Street, has a small dance floor, we can bump and grind ;)  I just don't think I can take another evening of top 40 hits.  Rock 'n Roll really gets the juices flowin'...lol.

So, I'll try and get there by 7:30 so we can get seats together.  I imagine the band starts at 9-9:30? They have a website, I think it's Slakas.com,  if I don't get any RSVP's by 5pm ish, I'll just cancell it.  I don't believe there is a cover either.

Hey Jen, why don't we celebrate your birthday there!

SUZ

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Slakas at the Haluwa in Nashua, anyone want to rock 'n roll casual?
